body_html:
@albanD It seems that @761d679 uses just 4 threads, while in more recent commits (@65b6626 or @15a9fbd) use more threads during backward phase. You were right, there's no problem when executing on the GPU.

I set the number of threads to 4. torch.set_num_threads(4)
body_text:
@albanD It seems that @761d679 uses just 4 threads, while in more recent commits (@65b6626 or @15a9fbd) use more threads during backward phase. You were right, there's no problem when executing on the GPU.
I set the number of threads to 4.    torch.set_num_threads(4)
body:
@albanD It seems that @761d679 uses just 4 threads, while in more recent commits (@65b6626 or @15a9fbd) use more threads during backward phase. You were right, there's no problem when executing on the GPU.

I set the number of threads to 4.    `torch.set_num_threads(4)`
